Class ConfirmationDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              javax.swing.JWindow
                  ConfirmationDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer
public class ConfirmationDialog
extends javax.swing.JWindow
implements java.lang.Runnable

Confirmation Dialog displays a progress bar with yes, no and cancel buttons. The user can say or click yes/no. If the user clicks yes or no before the two seconds is finished it will return immedialty.

Author:
Amir Raminfar
See Also:
Serialized Form
